ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Pause Problem
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a Duron based system using a Giga-byte motherboard, and I have experienced no problems with EQ after the patch.  If it was a VIA-based motherboard
ygData.messageBody:
I have a Duron based system using a Giga-byte motherboard, and I have
experienced no problems with EQ after the patch. If it was a VIA-based
motherboard problem, I should be experiencing pauses also.

Gilgurth

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Friday, November 17, 2000 2:59 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Pause Problem


That's not my problems. I tried that and tried disabling the sound (this is
very easy to do - create a text file called "nosound.txt" (contents don't
matter) in your EQ directory.

Made no difference whatsoever.

I've tried everything logical and many things not logical. It's a
code/compatibility problem - that I suspect is with VIA-based Motherboards..

Slyde




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
